aemorrhage after caesarean delivery 
• PPH may occur after the operation in the theatre recovery area or in the postnatal ward.
• Haemorrhage may be internal (intraperitoneal, extraperitoneal), or external (vaginal).
• Internal bleeding can be difficult to diagnose clinically - be aware of a post-CS patient with tachycardia and
tender abdomen, as the Hb does not drop immediately and the bleeding is concealed.
